tshirts.name: T-Shirts
tshirts.description_template:
High-quality unisex t-shirt featuring unique design artwork.

Perfect for casual wear, this comfortable Bella+Canvas tee offers:
• 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton
• Lightweight 4.2 oz fabric
• Retail fit with crew neckline
• Tear-away label for comfort
• Sustainably manufactured

Great gift for art lovers and anyone who appreciates unique style!

sweatshirts.name: Sweatshirts
sweatshirts.description_template:
Cozy and comfortable sweatshirt featuring unique design artwork.

Perfect for cooler weather, this premium sweatshirt offers:
• Soft cotton blend fabric
• Relaxed fit for comfort
• Ribbed cuffs and hem
• Quality construction
• Machine washable

Great for layering or wearing on its own!

posters.name: Art Prints/Posters
posters.description_template:
Beautiful high-quality art print featuring unique design artwork.

Perfect for home or office decor, this premium print offers:
• Museum-quality matte finish
• Fade-resistant inks
• Thick, durable paper stock
• Multiple size options
• Ready to frame

Transform any space with this stunning piece of art!
